name: Walter
description:
A normal guy, no smoking (usd to smoke till 15 years ago) no drugs, never done that, my hobbies are photography, sailing small sailboats and so now and then in winter I go skiing in the Alps, and I have a fast bike for summer, I like to travel to far away sunny places when it is cold in my country, I know how to cook a bit and try to eat as healthy as possible to stay slim and healthy and active, I am not a sportsman but I like to watch sports on TV and have great admiration for top sporters, I like to read good books and the daily newspapers.
A friendly woman with a sense of humor who is also interested in the world around us, what is going on, and non smoking and otherwise it all depends what is feels like when we are together or communicate.
